CustomField.description: This field is to be checked off by the BD or CSM to confirm that this customer has been fully briefed on the implications of the Burn Fee.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is to be checked off by the BD or CSM to confirm that a live conversation has happened and that this customer has been fully briefed on the implications of the Burn Fee.
CustomField.label: Burn Fee Communicated
